title: Rahu Transit in the 4th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting your fourth house unsettles emotional security, home environment, and inner peace. There is a strong urge to change residence, upgrade lifestyle, or redefine what comfort means to you. Restlessness at home or distance from family roots may be felt. While material comforts attract attention, emotional satisfaction may fluctuate. This transit teaches you to separate true inner stability from external symbols of comfort, encouraging conscious choices around home, property, and emotional grounding.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Inner peace depends on external surroundings.
Desire to redefine personal security rises.

sections.heading: Career
points: Work-from-home or remote setups gain focus.
Career decisions influenced by domestic factors.
Real estate or vehicle-related roles activate.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Distance from mother or maternal figures possible.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Spending rises on home, property, or upgrades.
Sudden expenses related to residence possible.
Financial clarity improves with long-term planning.

closing: Rahu here challenges emotional foundations. When inner security leads your choices, external comfort aligns naturally.
